timeline.message: Fix speedcore coalesce max files behavior

timeline.bodyText:
Wouldn't this override the groupMinSize variable and discard the compression ratio?
what was the observed symptom in testing?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: The problem with the current behavior is that when you have a CSV input and you say I want 100 files with groupMinSize small enough that I should be able to get 100 files, you instead get 20 files.
replies.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText: compressionRatio should not be downsizing maxNumFiles.
replies.author: bradyoo
